attributes.action: the closing of saint georges school walkden worlsley manchester and all catholic schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: saint georges school is known to be one of the best schools for education in the area, there are many catholics who after finishing   primary would normally go into this school, but it is being closed down as they say there isnt enough catholics around, the education and high ethics,are rarely found in the other schools, it is very important to catholic people that their children are brought up this way and a real shame that because we are not a catholic country, the catholic religion has no say in this at all, please do all you can to prevent this from happening thank you

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
